ttsApiNotEnabled.title: Google Cloud TTS API Not Enabled
ttsApiNotEnabled.message:
The Cloud Text-to-Speech API has not been enabled in your project.

How to fix:
1. Click the link below to open Google Cloud Console
2. Click 'Enable API' button
3. Wait a few minutes and try again

üí° After enabling the API, it may take a few minutes for the changes to propagate.

aiSpeechFailed.title: AI Speech Failed
aiSpeechFailed.message:
The AI failed to speak the response.

Possible causes:
‚Ä¢ TTS API key or proxy not configured
‚Ä¢ Network connection issues
‚Ä¢ TTS service temporary error

üí° You can read the text response and continue the conversation.

Check the browser console logs for detailed error information.
aiSpeechFailed.checkConsole: Open browser developer tools (F12) and check the Console tab for detailed error information.

aiSpeechTimeout.title: AI Not Responding
aiSpeechTimeout.message:
The AI generated a response but speech playback didn't start.

Possible causes:
‚Ä¢ TTS service response delay
‚Ä¢ Slow network connection
‚Ä¢ Browser audio playback blocked

üí° You can read the text response and continue the conversation.

Check the browser console logs for detailed information.
